Welcome to Cloud Platform for China\'s National Primary and Secondary Schools

In order to carry out the plans for work related to the prevention and control of COVID-19, and teaching in schools for the coming autumn semester, the Ministry of Education uses the Cloud Platform for China's National Primary and Secondary Schools to provide students with high-quality learning resources for independent learning. 

 The resources on the platform include: epidemic prevention education, moral education, curriculum learning, life and safety education, mental health education, family education, classical reading, study camp education, film and television education, etc. According to the national curriculum program and the curriculum standards of each subject, the three subjects of Language, Politics, and History use the national unified version of textbooks, and other subjects use most popular version of textbooks in the country. The resources will be updated and supplemented continuously. According to the national curriculum program and the curriculum standards of each subject, the three subjects of Language, Politics, and History use the national textbooks, and other subjects use the most popular version of textbooks in the country. The resources will be updated and supplemented continuously. 

 All learning resources on the platform are free and may not be used for commercial purposes.
如果需要开启或关闭【%1s】的新消息通知，请在系统设置的通知管理中，找到【%2s】进行修改
